description:
Adds Clan weapons to the game.

1.7

Correct weapon sounds and missile logic require Yet Another Weapon.

LBX mode switch (cluster / solid) requires the Yet Another Mechlab mod.

Weapon intro dates:
All "standard" Clan weapons become available in 3055 except:
ProtoMech Autocannons (3073)
Machine Gun Arrays, AP Gauss (3069)
Hyper-Assault Gauss (3068)
ER and Heavy Flamer (3067)
Light and Heavy MG (3060)
ATMs (3060)
ER and Pulse Micro Lasers (3060)
Heavy Lasers (3059)
ASRMs (3058)
ER Pulse Lasers, Streak LRMs (3057)

Standard weapons (3055):
Arrow IV
AC /2 /5 /10 /20
Ultra AC/2 /5 /10/20
LBX /2 /5 /10 /20
LRM / Artemis 5 10 15 20
SRM / Artemis / Streak 2 4 6
NARC
Laser AMS
Flamer
Gauss
ER Small, Medium, Large Lasers
Pulse Small, Medium, Large Lasers
ER PPC

Equipment (3055):
MASC, AP, Light AP, ECM, DHS

YAML Discord:
https://discord.gg/SnVahkkHEn

Item lists:
https://github.com/mw5mercs-modding/yaml-docs
author: cszolee79
